column4: The exact phrasing of the error is;; Error invoking "dvdnav_get_next_block"  Error reading NAV packet
I have been trying for four days to get DVD's to play in Breezy. help would be great
you followed the instructions on the wiki?
works fine for me
I don't see where you explained your exact issue, tho
don't use totem then
mplayer doesn't work?
er, reinstalling in the hope of fixing this is silly
mplayer didn't work?
didn't work is not a useful description of the error mplayer gave you
that sounds a lot more like you not running it correctly
what command line did you give to mplayer?
then don't say things like "mplayer didn't work", when in realiy you didn't try it
ok
then instead of saying "mplayer didn't work!", tell us what you tried
so, stop whinging
and install mplayer
then come back
pkill esd ; mplayer -vo xv -ao oss dvd://1
run that, then if it doesn't work, put the error on pastebin.ca
so, you don't have mplayer installed at all
go install it and come back
I wouldn't trust binary, closed-source stuff to touch my filesystem
